creator: factis GmbH
descriptionHtml:
The factis app is available on the smartphone for nursing staff, managers use the factis portal on a PC or tablet. Thanks to our live sync, all information is always up to date. All recorded times, services performed, documented data go back to the nursing software and can be viewed directly by the managers on the PC. This means that every service performed can be quickly checked and billed.

The integration of factis in your facility is easy. Because we work directly with the respective software providers.

factis home care - at a glance

* Document times and services with one click
* Enter and read the handover book from anywhere
* Write or speak in nursing reports
* Take wound photos, record vital signs
* Start navigation to the customer directly, maintain the driver's log
* Direct access to relevant contacts and colleagues on duty with you
* Fast and secure communication with your team via factis Messenger

factis - so that good things arrive.

factis home care is a product of factis GmbH. We have been making mobile communication since cell phones "can do internet" - in German, French, English.

The terms of use agreed with factis GmbH apply.

This app uses the Device Administrator permission to provide factory reset and device locking functionality through the factis Portal.
descriptionShort: An app from the experts in mobile communication in nursing.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: - full support for Android 10

creator: factis GmbH
descriptionHtml:
The factis app is available on the smartphone for nursing staff, managers use the factis portal on a PC or tablet. Thanks to our live sync, all information is always up to date. All recorded times, services performed, documented data go back to the nursing software and can be viewed directly by the managers on the PC. This means that every service performed can be quickly checked and billed.

The integration of factis in your facility is easy. Because we work directly with the respective software providers.

factis home care - at a glance

* Document times and services with one click
* Enter and read the handover book from anywhere
* Write or speak in nursing reports
* Take wound photos, record vital signs
* Start navigation to the customer directly, maintain the driver's log
* Direct access to relevant contacts and colleagues on duty with you
* Fast and secure communication with your team via factis Messenger

factis - so that good things arrive.

factis home care is a product of factis GmbH. We have been making mobile communication since cell phones "can do internet" - in German, French, English.

The terms of use agreed with factis GmbH apply.

This app uses the Device Administrator permission to provide factory reset and device locking functionality through the factis Portal.
descriptionShort: An app from the experts in mobile communication in nursing.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- documentation of symptoms in palliative care
- your master data and catalogs are synchronized automatically
- easy access to the most relevant vital signs
